title: Update welcome screen intro subtitle copy

requirements.summary: Replace the unauthenticated welcome screen subtitle under “Welcome to MyGallery” with the provided two-sentence English copy and preserved line break.
acceptanceCriteria: When logged out, the welcome screen shows the heading "Welcome to MyGallery" and the subtitle text exactly matches the provided English copy (including sentence text and line break/paragraph split).
No other user-facing text is changed.

file_operations.description: Update only the subtitle/intro text directly under the "Welcome to MyGallery" heading to exactly: "This is your personal space for organization and self-improvement.\nCreate missions, break them into tasks, and complete them step by step." Ensure the UI preserves the two-sentence split via an explicit line break within the rendered subtitle block, without changing any other user-facing copy.
